document.full_text: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords still struggles to piece together lengthy sentences, but one short phrase she repeats is: "i miss tucson," the arizona republic newspaper reported on sunday.
document.title: "i miss tucson", says recovering congresswoman giffords
lines_and_colors: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords still struggles to piece together lengthy sentences, but one short phrase she repeats is: "i miss tucson," the arizona republic newspaper reported on sunday.
